Description: Ovation 1235-5 1971 Eclipse Hollow Body Guitar - Lyrachord BlackSerial#: H 161Made in Germany/Assembled in USAProduction Year: 1970-1973 **Only 900 Made** This is a rare Ovation Eclipse 1235-5 with the black Lyrachord textured paint finish. Only 900 made, this guitar is in very good overall condition for its age. The headstock is excellent with the Ovation logo. The tuners have some nicks and pitting. The fingerboard is good with the frets having some wear. The guitar has some light scratches and nicks in the finish on the sides and edges. There are two small nicks on the fingerboard. Please see our last three photos. The guitar will come in an after market gig bag and be carefully packed for shipment. The Story:"Sold from 1969 - 1971, Ovation Eclipse is part of the Tornado series, during that time the body was made in Germany by Hofner Guitars, Ovation company in Conn recieved a shippment of Storm body's, the paint job did not meet expectations, so Ovation decided to re-paint them, Ovation in Conn did not have any paint other than the "bowl paint" used on the back of thier Acoustic guitars, so they painted these 100 or so body's with this very durable paint, they also up-graded the pick-up's and named these 100 or so the Eclipse.
